Feb. 25, 2018 D Oxfordshire & District BBA Winter Contest (First Section)
Oxfordshire & District BBA Winter Contest (First Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Winter Contest oxfordshire-district-bba-winter-contest--5603
None
First
Marlborough School, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK Marked according to the 'Mead mark sheet' scheme, i.e. sum of 10 categories of marks out of 10.
Best Instrumentalist: Soprano Cornet, City of Bristol
Special Prizes: Best Percussion of the day: City of Bristol Best Bass Section of the day: Michelmersh Silver Band Best Cornet of the day: A.W. Parker (Drybrook) Band Best Tenor Horn of the day: A.W. Parker (Drybrook) Band
Band with the most players U19: Yarnton Band Youngest Player: Eliza Rayner, Yarnton Band (Age 9)
Dec. 5, 2017, 11:26 p.m. Feb. 25, 2018, 6:18 p.m.
